install.description:
This authentication plugin checks for a match of either username or an email address with the password entered. It is a modified plugin of the default Joomla! authentication plugin. Please disable the deafult authentication plugin after you enable Email OR Username Plugin
Warning! You must have at least one authentication plugin enabled or you will lose all access to your site.
